dict.acceptation: 同时；在一起；一致地；不间断地；
稳定可靠的；做事有效率的；

sent.orig: In short, they robbed together, lay together, were taken together, and at last were hanged together.
sent.trans: 总之他们一同偷东西，一同睡觉，一同被抓去，最后一同上绞刑架。

sent.orig: They delighted in being together, doing things together, and sharing together.
sent.trans: 他们为能在一起生活，一起干活，一起分享而感到快乐。

sent.orig: We will study together, play together and enjoy the life together.
sent.trans: 我们将一起学习，一起玩耍，一起享受生活。

sent.orig: These atoms combine together to form a together to form elements &elements together form the substances.
sent.trans: 这些基本粒子组合在一起形成原子，原子再形成元素，而元素构成物质。

sent.orig: Petty interests freeze men together; common interests glue men together; noble interests melt men together.
sent.trans: 琐碎的兴趣使人们聚集在一起，共同的兴趣使人们粘合在一起，高尚的兴趣使人们溶合在一起。
